status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS 172 on iOS 5, Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 4), I noticed a translucent bar at the bottom of the table view. This bar acts like a footer as it remains in place until you scroll the table to the bottom at which point it detaches from the bottom of the view

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Install KS with SDK 1.7.2 onto iOS 5 device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 4)
3) Scroll the table to the bottom

Results:
The "footer" is visible and remains in place until the table is scrolled completely to the bottom.

Expected results:
No errant footer.

Note:
Does not occur with iOS 4.3x
Occurs with SDK 1.8.0.v20110922105247
Please see attached image for details
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchensink - Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 4) on iOS5 seems to have a footer not seen with iOS 4.3.x.
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.7.2 GA, SDK SDK 1.8.0.v20110922105247, iPhone 4 AT&T (iOS 5.0).

comments.body: confirmed against ios5 b7, ipod and ipad2. Sep 30 2011 14:54 r64ba63b7 keeping open until regressed against master

Tested with SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111203093857
iPhone 4s 5.0.1
iPad 2 4.3.5
iPod 3rd gen 4.0.2
